sections.title: I: Journey's Beginning
items: Gather resources to build a house
Create a table, a chair, and a door for the 👨 GUIDE

sections.title: II: The Corruption
items: 👨 PAINTER: have at least 8 town NPCs
👨 GOLFER: talk to him in the Underground Desert

sections.title: III: The Dungeon
items: Craft a Phaseblade (15 meteorite bars and 10 gems)
Isolate the NPCs from the corruption by creating a 6-blocks wide trench around their houses

sections.title: IV: The Hell
items: Craft an Obsidian Skull (20 obsidian) (immunizes against fire damage)
Craft some Obsidian Skin Potions (immunizes against lava damage)

sections.title: V: The Hardmode
items: Farm the 💀 WALL OF FLESH as many times as necessary to get the Pwnhammer and the Emblems
Destroy the altars in corrupted biomes with the Pwnhammer to spawn new ores

sections.title: VI: Mechanical Terrors
items: 🛡️ Gear up for the boss (weapons, potions & armor)
💀 THE DESTROYER: summon the boss at night with a Mechanical Worm, then defeat it

sections.title: VII: The Green Inferno
items: Find some Life Fruits in the jungle biome and max out your HP to 500
Upgrade your gear with chlorophyte

sections.title: VIII: The Ritual
items: 🛡️ Gear up for the boss (weapons, potions & armor)
Find the jungle temple entrance and explore it

sections.title: IX: The King of the oceans
items: 🛡️ Gear up for the bosses (weapons, potions & armor)
📅 OLD ONE'S ARMY: put an Eternia Crystal in the Eternia Crystal Stand and survive until the boss

sections.title: X: Journey's End
items: Upgrade your gear and weapons rarity by reforging them at the 👨 GOBLIN TINKERER
🛡️ Gear up for the bosses (weapons, potions & armor)

sections.title: Post Moon Lord
items: Upgrade all accessories and craft a Cell Phone
Craft the mining mount Drill Containment Unit
